title: Mafia 2: Enhanced Edition [v 1.0.0.1u5 + DLC's + Mods] (2010) PC
description:
Release Date : December 3, 2010
Genre : Action

Published in Russia : SoftKlab

Description: "Mafia" is immortal: the long-awaited continuation of the famous gangster saga from the creators of the original game - a new immersion in a ruthless and intriguing world , full of thrills .

Mafia II is created by specially designed graphics engine, allowing sponsors to embody all the most daring ideas, and say a new word in the genre , which defined the canons first "Mafia" . Classical elements - shooting , fighting, moving around in various forms of transport - have acquired an unprecedented scale , and the game world has become truly limitless .

The protagonist of modern history - Vito , the son of Italian immigrants who grew up in poverty and injustice . Since childhood, he learned that the Mafia - the only way to riches and respect for the rights of its provisions , and not wanting to languish , full of hardship, as her father , decided to become a gangster.

The criminal career of Vito and his sidekick, Joe begins with petty theft and car theft, however quickly they will rise to higher levels of the criminal ladder. And then it turns out that real life is "tough guys" are not as cloudless as it appeared in the boys' dreams.


Features:
To be a gangster . Vivid images of credible , strong story and great presentation - it all allow you to feel the drama and unpredictability of the relationship between mafia clans and those in them is.
Forget the rest . Thrilling car chases, violent fights and frantic shooting - a combination of these elements provides a rich and varied gameplay .
Living in the city . With the latest graphics engine Illusion Engine Ã¢â€žÂ¢ players can explore a vast world, without wasting time waiting for the next boot : a stroll through the picturesque streets of Empire Bay, covers an area of Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹over 25 square kilometers , or go inside the buildings and enjoy an elaborated interiors .
Learn America . Cars, advertising , clothing - all the signs of American life 1940 -50- ies, recreated as accurately as possible , changes over time in the game in accordance with the historical realities .
Play the classics . A selection of the best songs the mid XX century will immerse themselves in the atmosphere of an American "Golden Age ."
Additions Enhanced Edition:
Three story additions
Joe's Adventure. Acting as Joe , you will know who sent Vito behind bars and why should not communicate with his family Clemente.
Jimmy's Vendetta. Assassin Jimmy wipe the mud for other - not yet " podterlas " him. But come the day of reckoning !
Betrayal of Jimmy. Playing for Jimmy , you have to find out what events led him to take revenge .

Five sets of clothes and cars for the main character Mafia II
Vegas Pack - attributes chic life : two dandy suit and two luxury cars .
Renegade Pack - sports coupe and hot-rod style 1950 with uprated engine , leather and " baseball " jackets.
Greaser Pack - two hot-rod speedster ; leather suit professional racer , a leather jacket and a pair of heavy boots .
War Hero Pack - back to 1940 : Two army auto , grand and field military uniforms .
Made Man Pack - two luxury cars of the time , and two new suits , which includes an old-fashioned tuxedo .
